name: Vitale #40
description: Your 0.80 carat Fancy Intense Yellowish Brown diamond is rare, with a captivating and distinctive combination of hues. The brown to yellow tint in your diamond is caused by the presence of nitrogen during the formation process, resulting in the total absorption of blue light waves. The intense yellowish brown tones of your diamond can convey a heightened sense of warmth and comfort, exuding a cozy and inviting ambiance.

attributes.value: Fancy Intense Yellowish Brown Natural Color
